name: Asuka 120% LimitOver Burning Fest.
summary: Asuka 120% LimitOver Burning Fest. is an "unofficial" update to the series' earlier "Limited" entry on Sega Saturn. It was originally released in 1998 as a series of patch files to be used on a legitimate copy of the game. This version of the game is stripped down purely to its "Versus" mode, and features a heavily rebalanced cast, along with a few mechanical tweaks.
